div.h2: SNOMED CT to ICD-10-CM mappings for fracture of ulna (http://hl7.org/fhir/ConceptMap/103)
div.p: DRAFT (not intended for production usage). Published on Jun 13, 2012 by HL7, Inc (FHIR project team (example): http://hl7.org/fhir; ). Creative Commons 0
Example rule-based mappings between SNOMED CT to ICD-10-CM for fracture of ulna

tr.td: The target mapping to ICD-10-CM is narrower, since additional patient data on the encounter (initial vs. subsequent) and fracture type is required for a valid ICD-10-CM mapping.

The target mapping to ICD-10-CM is narrower, since additional patient data on the encounter (initial vs. subsequent), fracture type and healing (for subsequent encounter) is required for a valid ICD-10-CM mapping.
